about.description:
The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
applications that use the LAL MetaIO library.  If you want to install
the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalmetaio
package.

The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: lalmetaio
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "lalmetaio" %}
{% set version = "1.5.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "40484f42768daae3ffcc6a9a1aa36887af912c272eca283b4557c92d98fd78ca" %}

# dependencies
{% set lal_version = "6.20.0" %}
{% set swig_version = "3.0.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - make
    - pkg-config
    - swig >={{ swig_version }}
  host:
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - metaio
  run:
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - metaio
test:
  commands:
    - lalmetaio_version --verbose

outputs:
  - name: lalmetaio
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("lalmetaio", max_pin="x.x") }}

  - name: python-lalmetaio
    script: install-python.sh
    build:
      activate_in_script: True
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - make
        - pkg-config
        - swig >={{ swig_version }}
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalmetaio', exact=True) }}
        - numpy 1.9
        - python
      run:
        - lal
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalmetaio', exact=True) }}
        - metaio
        - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
        - python
        - python-lal >={{ lal_version }}
    test:
      imports:
        - lalmetaio
    about:
      home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LALSuite
      doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalmetaio/
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
      license: GPLv3
      license_family: GPL
      license_file: COPYING
      summary: LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library
      description: |
        The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
        This package contains the python bindings.

about:
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalmetaio/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
  license: GPLv3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library
  description: |
    The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
    This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
    applications that use the LAL MetaIO library.  If you want to install
    the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalmetaio
    package.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
